fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Taxation
head_office_address: CAMRA, the Campaign for Real Ale 230 Hatfield Road Hertfordshire
eu_initiatives: Our EU initiatives are limited except in the circumstances where they impact on real ale drinkers and pub goers in the UK.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
In situations where EU legislation impacts on pub goers and beer drinkers in the UK we campaign to represent the consumer in a number of ways. This may include writing letters to MEPs and Commissioners, putting together policy briefings, attending receptions or setting up meetings with MEPs, Commissioners and Officials. 
 
CAMRA is also a member of the European Beer Consumer Union (EBCU), which runs its own engagement activity.
goals__remit: CAMRA, the Campaign for Real Ale is an independent, voluntary organisation campaigning for real ale, community pubs and consumer rights.
